    <metadata>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water condensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserkondensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensation de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condensação da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condensazione dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπύκνωση ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensación del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This cartoon shows that water vapour coming from the kettle condenses back into water when it reaches the glass window.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kettle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">window</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikatur zeigt, daß der Wasserdampf, der 
vom Kessel kommt, zurück in Wasser kondensiert, wenn er das 
Glasfenster erreicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce dessin animé prouve que la vapeur d'eau 
venant de la bouilloire condense de nouveau dans l'eau quand elle 
atteint la fenêtre de verre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este cartoon mostra que o vapor de água que vem 
da chaleira se condensa para trás na água quando alcança a janela 
de vidro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo fumetto indica che il vapore acqueo che 
viene dalla caldaia condensa nuovamente dentro acqua quando raggiunge 
la finestra di vetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια δείχνουν ότι ο υδρατμός που
προέρχεται από την κατσαρόλα συμπυκνώνει πίσω στο ύδωρ όταν 
φθάνει στο παράθυρο γυαλιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta historieta muestra que el vapor de agua que 
viene de la caldera condensa nuevamente dentro del agua cuando alcanza
la ventana de cristal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensation</string>
          </keyword>
